title: Lateral entry
content:
Is lateral entry there for 1st year students??
Like 1st yr to 2nd year.
I mailed pes but they asked me to come to the campus with the documents and get the details,I'm at muj so I can't do it.

comments.body: I don't think pes provides lateral entry for anyone other than diploma students .

stay at muj, dont come here

you can thank me later for saving ur life

Firstly pes doesn't accept lateral entry so that dream is gone.
Secondly muj is shit...pure shit...shit from the ass shit
Guys could u guys tell me colleges that accept lateral transfer in banglore plss
